| video1= "[http://www.ktvu.com/video/29587714/index.html RAW VIDEO: Ground footage of Occupy Oakland march and crowd dispersal.]" Demonstrators march down Broadway Blvd. and arrive at police barricades blocking entry to Frank Ogawa Plaza. Oakland Police issue warnings to disperse. Marine veteran Scott Olsen can be seen falling to the pavement at 3:15. A police officer throws a flash bang in the crowd attempting to aid Olson at 3:30.<ref name="KTVU teargas Oct.25th">{{cite web |url=http://www.ktvu.com/video/29587714/index.html |title=RAW VIDEO: Ground footage of Occupy Oakland march and crowd dispersal |date=October 25, 2011 |publisher=KTVU |accessdate=October 27, 2011}}</ref>

On October 25th, Scott Olsen, a former [[United States Marine Corps|Marine]] and [[Iraq War]] veteran, and a member of [[Veterans for Peace]], suffered a [[bone fracture|skull fracture]] caused by a shooting [[projectile]] that witnesses believed was a tear gas or smoke canister fired by the police.<ref name="Reuters Olson">{{cite news
